result.arabic_text: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
result.translation: All that is in the heavens and earth glorifies[1] Allah, for He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
result.footnotes: [1] By praising and exalting Him far above any deficiency or imperfection.
